channel.title: CVE Feed for unspecified -- Simple History Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for unspecified -- Simple History Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-4011|2024-08-03T01:27:54.091Z -- unspecified -- simple%20history%20plugin
item.description: A vulnerability was found in Simple History Plugin. It has been rated as critical. This issue affects some unknown processing of the component Header Handler. The manipulation of the argument X-Forwarded-For leads to improper output neutralization for logs. The attack may be initiated remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. The identifier VDB-213785 was assigned to this vulnerability.
